Text: Thomas Cook's syndicate of more than a dozen bank lenders has been criticised by unnamed sources for demanding the additional £200m of standby funding to see the company through tough winter trading - a demand revealed by Sky News last week.
Cause: see the company through tough winter trading - a demand revealed by Sky News last week.
Effect: Thomas Cook's syndicate of more than a dozen bank lenders has been criticised by unnamed sources for demanding the additional £200m of standby funding
Sentence: <e2>Thomas Cook's syndicate of more than a dozen bank lenders has been criticised by unnamed sources for demanding the additional £200m of standby funding</e2> to <e1>see the company through tough winter trading - a demand revealed by Sky News last week.</e1>
